<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Scorned Hound](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1896)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Scorned hounds rise from the most devoted dogs. They're incredibly possessive of their owners, allowing no living beings to approach and refusing to be parted.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Scorned Hound](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1896)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 142</row>

**Perception** +7; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet, sense companion

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Sense Companion** ([detection](/Traits.aspx?ID=43), [divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) A scorned hound knows the direction of its past owner or family (as long as they're both on the same plane), but not the distance.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 22
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

**Stench** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) 10 feet. A creature entering the aura or starting its turn in the aura must succeed at a DC 14 Fortitude save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (plus [slowed 1](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) for as long as it's sickened on a critical failure). While within the aura, affected creatures take a –2 circumstance penalty to saves against [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) and to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +9,
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**Betray the Pack**   The hound's Strikes deal 1d4 additional damage to creatures that were once its owner, companion, fellow pet, family, household, or pack.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-309" />
name: Scorned Hound
